verses.verse: Peter,<WG4074> an apostle<WG652> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> to the chosen ones who are living as foreigners<WG3927> in the Dispersion in<WG1290> Pontus,<WG4195> Galatia,<WG1053> Cappadocia,<WG2587> Asia,<WG773> and<WG2532> Bithynia,<WG1588>

according to<WG2596> the foreknowledge<WG4268> of God<WG2316> the Father,<WG3962> in<WG1722> sanctification<WG38> of the Spirit,<WG4151> that<WG1519> you may obey<WG5218> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> and<WG2532> be sprinkled<WG4473> with his blood:<WG129> Grace<WG5485> to you<WG5213> and<WG2532> peace<WG1515> be multiplied.<WG4129>

Blessed<WG2128> be the God<WG2316> and<WG2532> Father<WG3962> of<WG2962> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> who<WG3588> according to<WG2596> his<WG846> great<WG4183> mercy<WG1656> became<WG313> our<WG2248> father again<WG313> to<WG1519> a living<WG2198> hope<WG1680> through<WG1223> the resurrection<WG386> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498>
to<WG1519> an incorruptible<WG862> and<WG2532> undefiled<WG283> inheritance<WG2817> that<WG2532> doesn't<WG263> fade away, reserved<WG5083> in<WG1722> Heaven<WG3772> for<WG1519> you,<WG5209>

who<WG3588> by<WG1722> the power<WG1411> of God<WG2316> are guarded<WG5432> through<WG1223> faith<WG4102> for<WG1519> a salvation<WG4991> ready<WG2092> to be revealed<WG601> in<WG1722> the last<WG2078> time.<WG2540>

Wherein<WG1722> you greatly rejoice,<WG21> though now<WG737> for a little while,<WG3641> if<WG1487> need be,<WG1163> you have been<WG2076> put to grief<WG3076> in<WG1722> various<WG4164> trials,<WG3986>

that<WG2443> the proof<WG1383> of your<WG5216> faith,<WG4102> which is more<WG4183> precious<WG5093> than gold<WG5553> that<WG3588> perishes<WG622> even though<WG1161> it is tested<WG1381> by<WG1223> fire,<WG4442> may be found<WG2147> to<WG1519> result in<WG1519> praise,<WG1868> glory,<WG1391> and<WG2532> honor<WG5092> at<WG1722> the revelation<WG602> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>—

whom<WG3739> not<WG3756> having<WG1492> known<WG1492> you love;<WG25> in<WG1519> whom,<WG3739> though now<WG737> you don't<WG3361> see<WG3708> him,<WG1161> yet believing,<WG4100> you rejoice<WG21> greatly with joy<WG5479> unspeakable<WG412> and<WG2532> full of glory<WG1392> —
receiving<WG2865> the result<WG5056> of your<WG5216> faith,<WG4102> the salvation<WG4991> of<WG5590> your souls.<WG5590>

Concerning<WG4012> this<WG3739> salvation,<WG4991> the prophets<WG4396> sought<WG1567> and<WG2532> searched diligently,<WG1830> who prophesied<WG4395> of<WG4012> the grace<WG5485> that would come to<WG1519> you,<WG5209>

searching<WG2045> for<WG1519> who<WG5101> or<WG2228> what kind of<WG4169> time<WG2540> the Spirit<WG4151> of Christ,<WG5547> which<WG3588> was in<WG1722> them,<WG846> pointed<WG1213> to,<WG4303> when he predicted the sufferings<WG3804> of<WG1519> Christ,<WG5547> and<WG2532> the glories<WG1391> that<WG5023> would follow them.<WG3326>

To them<WG3739> it was revealed,<WG601> that<WG3754> not<WG3756> to themselves,<WG1438> but<WG1161> to you,<WG2254> they ministered<WG1247> these things,<WG846> which<WG3739> now<WG3568> have been<WG312> announced<WG312> to you<WG5213> through<WG1223> those<WG3588> who preached the Good News<WG2097> to you<WG5209> by<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> sent out<WG575> from<WG575> heaven;<WG3772> which things<WG3739> angels<WG32> desire<WG1937> to look<WG3879> into.<WG1519>

Therefore,<WG1352> prepare<WG328> <WG3751> your<WG5216> minds<WG1271> for action,<WG3525> be sober and set your hope<WG1679> fully<WG5049> on<WG1909> the grace<WG5485> that will be brought<WG5342> to you<WG5213> at<WG1722> the revelation<WG602> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>—
as<WG5613> children<WG5043> of obedience,<WG5218> not<WG3361> conforming yourselves according to<WG4964> your former<WG4386> lusts<WG1939> as in<WG1722> your<WG5216> ignorance,<WG52>
but<WG235> just<WG2532> as<WG2596> he who called<WG2564> you<WG5209> is holy,<WG40> you<WG846> yourselves also be<WG1096> holy<WG40> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> of your behavior;<WG391>
because<WG1360> it is written,<WG1125> "You<WG1096> shall be holy;<WG40> for<WG3754> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> holy.<WG40>"

<WG2532> If<WG1487> you call on<WG1941> him as Father,<WG3962> who<WG3588> without respect of persons<WG678> judges<WG2919> according to<WG2596> each man<WG1538>'s work,<WG2041> pass<WG390> the time<WG5550> of your<WG5216> living<WG3940> as foreigners here in<WG1722> reverent fear:<WG5401>

knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> you were<WG3084> redeemed,<WG3084> not<WG3756> with corruptible things,<WG5349> with silver<WG694> or<WG2228> gold,<WG5553> from<WG1537> the useless<WG3152> way of life<WG391> handed down from your<WG5216> fathers,<WG3970>
but<WG235> with precious<WG5093> blood,<WG5613> as of a faultless<WG299> and<WG2532> pure<WG784> lamb,<WG286> the blood<WG129> of Christ;<WG5547>

who was foreknown<WG4267> indeed<WG3303> before<WG4253> the foundation<WG2602> of the world,<WG2889> but<WG1161> was revealed<WG5319> at<WG1909> the end<WG2078> of times<WG5550> for<WG1223> your sake,<WG5209>

who<WG3588> through<WG1223> him<WG846> are believers<WG4100> in<WG1519> God,<WG2316> who<WG3588> raised<WG1453> him<WG846> <WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498> and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> him<WG846> glory;<WG1391> so that<WG5620> your<WG5216> faith<WG4102> and<WG2532> hope<WG1680> might be<WG1511> in<WG1519> God.<WG2316>

Seeing you have purified<WG48> your<WG5216> souls<WG5590> in<WG1722> your obedience<WG5218> to the truth<WG225> through<WG1223> the Spirit<WG4151> in sincere<WG505> brotherly<WG5360> affection,<WG25> love<WG25> one another<WG240> from<WG1537> the<WG2513> heart<WG2588> fervently:<WG1619>

having been born again,<WG313> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> corruptible<WG5349> seed,<WG4701> but<WG235> of incorruptible,<WG862> through<WG1223> the word<WG3056> of God,<WG2316> which lives<WG2198> and<WG2532> remains<WG3306> <WG1519> forever.<WG165>

For,<WG1360> "All<WG3956> flesh<WG4561> is like<WG5613> grass,<WG5528> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> of man<WG444>'s glory<WG1391> like<WG5613> the flower<WG438> in the grass.<WG5528> The grass<WG5528> withers,<WG3583> and<WG2532> its<WG846> flower<WG438> falls;<WG1601>

but<WG1161> the Lord<WG2962>'s word<WG4487> endures<WG3306> forever.<WG1519>" <WG165> <WG1161> This<WG5124> is<WG2076> the word<WG4487> of Good News which<WG3588> was preached<WG2097> to<WG1519> you.<WG5209>
